articles.title: Survey shows 2 in 3 Indians clean homes regularly, most frequent in SE Asia
articles.description: A global survey of over 30,000 people shows that 46 per cent of Indians have significantly increased their frequency of cleaning households, and 2 in 3 people clean 5-7 times a week, the most frequent from South East Asia countries surveyed.
